insurancemodel

Class BuildingPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • insurancemodel.Policy
      • insurancemodel.BuildingPolicy

  • public class BuildingPolicy
extends Policy
    This is a class to create and control all building insurance policies. It contains details of the estimated cost of rebuilding, risk of insuring the building and premium of the insurance policy.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class insurancemodel.Policy

        policyNo, policyYear

    • Constructor Detail

      • BuildingPolicy

        public BuildingPolicy(int policyYear,
                      java.lang.String policyNo,
                      double newRebuildCost,
                      double newInsuranceRisk)
               throws IllegalPolicyException
        Constructor for the BuildingPolicy class. Takes variables that are inherited from the Policy class and that are parsed in from the InputData class.
        Parameters:
        policyYear - inherited int variable from Policy.java that is the year of issue for this policy
        policyNo - inherited String variable from Policy.java that is the unique number of this policy
        newRebuildCost - the estimated cost of rebuilding the building if it were to collapse
        newInsuranceRisk - the risk (1 being the highest, 0 being the lowest) that the insurance company is taking on with this BuildingPolicy
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - catches any policyNos and policyYears that are out-width their boundaries

    • Method Detail

      • getRebuildCost

        public double getRebuildCost()
        Accessor method for retrieving the estimated cost of rebuilding
        Returns:
        a double value that is the estimated cost of rebuilding for this BuildingPolicy object.

      • getInsuranceRisk

        public double getInsuranceRisk()
        Accessor method for retrieving the risk of insurance attached to this policy.
        Returns:
        a double value that is the estimated risk attached to the company taking on this BuildingPolicy object. (1 high - 0 low)

      • setRebuildCost

        public void setRebuildCost(double newRebuildCost)
        Mutator method for changing the estimated cost of rebuilding
        Parameters:
        newRebuildCost - the new estimated cost of rebuilding for this BuildingPolicy object.

      • setInsuranceRisk

        public void setInsuranceRisk(double newInsuranceRisk)
        Mutator method for changing the risk of insurance attached to this policy
        Parameters:
        newInsuranceRisk - the new estimated risk for this BuildingPolicy object.

      • getPremium

        public double getPremium()
        Abstract method that is inherited from Policy to calculate the premiums for Life Insurance policies.
        Returns:
        the calculated premium for a this LifePolicy object.
